rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall designed to greet visitors. Vastu principles have been considered by placing the door in the auspicious direction.
Large open-plan living area with ample natural light and a view of the swimming pool. Vastu guidelines ensure optimal energy flow.
A dining space adjacent to the living room, promoting social interactions during meals.
Modern kitchen with functional layout and adherence to local building norms; positioned away from the main entrance per Vastu recommendations.
Spacious master bedroom facing north-east to harness positive energy, with an attached private bathroom and walk-in closet.
Additional bedroom adhering to Vastu principles with a west-facing orientation for calmness.
Another bedroom designed as per local building norms and Vastu guidelines. Placed to ensure balanced energy distribution.
Third bedroom with similar specifications for a harmonious design.
Primary bathroom for the living areas, designed to maintain privacy and functionality.
Secondary bathroom accessible from the bedrooms or utility area.
A dedicated study room in a quiet corner of the house to promote concentration and positive energy flow.

openings.description: Main door from the entrance hall to the living room.
Large window ensuring natural light and a view towards the pool area, placed per Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Door connecting entrance hall to the kitchen.
Window for natural light in the kitchen, positioned according to Vastu to avoid negative energy.
